Name: Fruit and Nut Chocolate Cocktail
Ingredients: 10 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
10 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Crumble a piece of Cadbury's Flake over the cocktail.
Review: Naughty but nice - one for confectionery lovers.
Nutrition: One serving of Fruit and Nut Chocolate Cocktail contains 224 calories
